import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Navbar from '../components/Navbar'; import './Movies.css'; function Movies() { const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState(null); // Tracks which category is selected // Day 1 APTG data const dayOneAptg = [ { name: "DOOKUDU", year: 2011 }, { name: "OOSARAVALLI", year: 2011 }, { name: "BUSINESSMAN", year: 2012 }, { name: "RACHA", year: 2012 }, { name: "DAMMU", year: 2012 }, { name: "GABBAR SINGH", year: 2012 }, { name: "CMGR", year: 2012 }, { name: "BADSHAH", year: 2013 }, { name: "ATTARINTIKI DAREDI", year: 2013 }, { name: "AGADU", year: 2014 }, { name: "BAAHUBALI", year: 2015 }, { name: "SRIMANTUDU *", year: 2015 }, { name: "SARDAR GABBAR SINGH *", year: 2016 }, { name: "K 150 *", year: 2017 }, { name: "JAI LAVA KUSA *Gross", year: 2017 }, { name: "BAAHUBALI 2", year: 2017 }, { name: "AGNATHAVASI *", year: 2018 }, { name: "ARAVINDA SAMETHA *", year: 2018 }, { name: "SAAHO *", year: 2019 }, { name: "SYE RAA *", year: 2019 }, { name: "RRR", year: 2022 }, { name: "SALAAR *", year: 2023 }, { name: "DEVARA *", year: 2024 }, { name: "PUSHPA 2 *", year: 2024 }, ]; return (

); } export default Movies;
